properties.property:
KFEAT: N!? = c : if you.absdepth() < 6 then KMONS: 1L = rat / nothing w:3 KMONS: 2 = river rat : else KMONS: 1L = goblin ; nothing / nothing w:3 KMONS: 2 = hobgoblin : end {{ function callback.uskayaw_smym(data, triggerable, triggerer, marker, ev) if not dgn.persist.uskayaw_smym_triggered and you.god() == "Uskayaw" then crawl.god_speaks("Uskayaw", 'Uskayaw says "Welcome, mortal! Now... ' .. 'Let me see you dance!'); for slave in iter.slave_iterator("to_door", 1) do dgn.terrain_changed(slave.x, slave.y, "closed_door", false) end for slave in iter.slave_iterator("to_floor", 1) do dgn.terrain_changed(slave.x, slave.y, "floor", false) end for slave in iter.slave_iterator("to_glass", 1) do dgn.terrain_changed(slave.x, slave.y, "clear_stone_wall", false) end crawl.god_speaks("Uskayaw", "A pounding rhythm fills the dungeon!") dgn.persist.uskayaw_smym_triggered = true end end
dgn.persist.uskayaw_smym_triggered = false local los_marker = TriggerableFunction:new { func="callback.uskayaw_smym", repeated=true } los_marker:add_triggerer(DgnTriggerer:new {type="player_los"}) lua_marker('U', los_marker) lua_marker('!', props_marker {to_floor=1}) lua_marker('?', props_marker {to_door=1}) lua_marker('N', props_marker {to_glass=1}) }}
